gobblin.data.management.retention.dataset

Class FsCleanableHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.retention.dataset.FsCleanableHelper

  • public class FsCleanableHelper
extends Object
    A helper class to delete Paths of a FileSystemDatasetVersion.

    Supports the following job level settings:

    • Simulate Mode - Only log paths to be deleted without deleting data by setting "gobblin.retention.simulate" to true.
    • Skip Trash - Delete permanent by setting "gobblin.retention.skip.trash" to true.
    • Auto delete empty parent directories - By setting "gobblin.retention.delete.empty.directories" to true.
    • Proxy as owner and delete - By setting "gobblin.retention.delete.as.owner" to true.

    • Method Detail

      • clean

        public void clean(FileSystemDatasetVersion versionToDelete,
                  Set<Path> possiblyEmptyDirectories)
           throws IOException
        Delete a single FileSystemDatasetVersion. All the parent Paths are after deletion, are added to possiblyEmptyDirectories. Caller need to call cleanEmptyDirectories(Set, FileSystemDataset) to delete empty parent directories if any.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • clean

        public void clean(Collection<? extends FileSystemDatasetVersion> deletableVersions,
                  FileSystemDataset fsDataset)
           throws IOException

        Parameters:
        fsDataset - to which the version belongs.
        Throws:
        IOException
